name: Cyrus R. SANDERS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, and Department of Corrections, Appellees

parties: Cyrus R. SANDERS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, and Department of Corrections, Appellees.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of September, 2011, the Order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

29 A.3d 1148
Cyrus R. SANDERS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, and Department of Corrections, Appellees.
